name: Alt Oxygen (itch)
description:
Alt Oxygen has arrived. A new law of survival experience!

- Psychological story from Darwin theory, faith, science-fiction thoughts and more!

- Economical design to survive : collect, sell, buy and galactic casino for more money!

- Interact with aliens to know more about planets!

- Hidden places and more!

- Buy now, play the game and share your thoughts with us!

System requirements 

    MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: i7-4510U 2.0 GHz or Equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 670 or Equivalent
    • Storage: 7 GB available space
    RECOMMENDED:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: i7-8700 3.20 GHz or Equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1050-TI or Equivalent
    • Storage: 7 GB available space

We would like for the community to join our discord development server and share their feedback.
Click on https://discord.gg/U5SRBgbxM5 to join.
